name: Dream State (HOPL)
description:
Description:
Suffering from nightmares, you must find a way to escape each one.

Controls:

LeftARightD
JumpW or SpaceGrabLeft Click

Early Release Notes:

There is currently only 1 level which will be used as the tutorial level in the future. Additional levels will feature themes from common nightmares we all share.

There is currently no sounds in the game.

Game Jam Notes:

  • The Honest Jam III
  • Made using GameMakerStudio v2.3.7.606.
  • Art was made using GIMP v2.10.
  • Character Animations were made in Spine v4.0.53
  • Team Size: 1
  • Dev: Dakota Oberon

Accessibility Features:

  • OpenDyslexia Font
